author: Tim Marcin
title: 11 harmless April Fools' Day pranks, if you need a little fun to brighten your day
description: Times are weird. Things are awful. There's a deadly pandemic sweeping the world. But you can still have some (harmless) fun on April Fools' Day. Let us be super, super, (super, super) clear: Now is the not the time for cruel pranks that risk seriously hurting…
content:
